statements: UPDATE ProteinInteractions SET interaction_score = 8.75 WHERE interaction_id = 1;

UPDATE DrugDiscoveryModel SET model_description = 'This model predicts drug interactions' WHERE model_id = 200
UPDATE ProteinInteractionData SET interaction_partner_id = 10, interaction_strength = 0.8 WHERE protein_id = 101

UPDATE Protein_Interactions SET interaction_strength = 0.8 WHERE protein_id = 1;
UPDATE Protein_Interactions SET interaction_type = 'binding', interaction_partner_id = 3 WHERE protein_id = 2;
UPDATE Protein_Interactions SET interaction_type = 'Binding', interaction_strength = 0.8 WHERE protein_id = 1;

UPDATE protein_interactions SET interaction_type = 'Physical Interaction', interaction_strength = 0.75 WHERE protein_id = 101 AND interaction_partner_id = 201;

UPDATE interactions SET interaction_strength=0.8 WHERE interaction_id=2
